titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to make a stillborn child an insurable dependent for purposes for the Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/30/2008--Introduced. Makes a stillborn child an insurable dependent under the Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance Program for veterans and their survivors and dependents.
